Message:
Blown by the wind,
a small scattering of petals
rises into the air all at once.
A cheer of joy rings out
as the storm of petals covers
the sky in its fluttering dance.

It appears the season of spring
is upon us once more.

Master.
Your beloved flowers are
blooming yet again this year.

Even this flower festival,
once only the custom
of this tiny village,

now brings in people
from all over to partake
in the festivities.

Just as you wished,
this festival is bringing smiles
to the faces of people from
all around the world.

If you could see
the scene before me,
I’m certain you would be
beside yourself with joy.

Or, perhaps you are already
watching from somewhere
far above.

Master.
Even now, I’m keeping
my promise to you.

I’m still here,
keeping the dream
you spoke of all those
years ago alive...
